name: Jimmys Fantastic Journey
overview: Jimmy's Fantastic Journey , is a classic Jump 'n' Run game, Consisting of four worlds, each containing six levels. Your graphics are beautifully colored and the levels consist of known ones Jump 'n' Run elements. But there is a special feature. Jimmy has the ability to eliminate cheating opponents with chewing gumball And can also cross obstacles on the basis of the floating bubbles. Jimmy's Fantastic Journey is aimed at all Jump 'n' Run fans with experience, With only four initial lives and tight time limits, the individual levels are made more difficult. Memory levels , level codes or continuos are also not included. Only, the reset points in the level itself are present at loss of a life.
